level.heading: Payment of tax by purchaser.
level.text: If a purchaser has not reimbursed for the tax such vendors or retailers as are required or authorized to pay the tax, as the case may be, such purchaser shall file a return as hereinafter provided and pay to the Mayor a tax at the rates provided in § 47-2002 on the sales prices of property and services purchased at retail sale.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-131
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-131, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2201.
